plan.name: chat
plan.rationale: Single turn direct response for conversational interaction

plan.name: capture
plan.rationale: Direct recording preserves exact content without analysis or transformation

readback.name: Readback
readback.description: Retrieve and restate previously mentioned information

plan.name: readback
plan.rationale: Direct recall and presentation of information from conversation history

plan.name: investigate
plan.rationale: Task strategy with tools for systematic discovery and examination. Multiple cycles support thorough exploration of external sources

analyze.name: Analyze
analyze.description: Examine structure, identify patterns, and reason about information

plan.name: analyze
plan.rationale: Task strategy with multiple cycles allows iterative thinking and refinement. No tools needed as analysis works on already-gathered information

synthesize.name: Synthesize
synthesize.description: Combine and integrate information into coherent output

plan.name: synthesize
plan.rationale: Direct synthesis integrates findings into unified framework. Comprehensive length for thorough presentation

execute.name: Execute
execute.description: Perform work by calling tools to make changes

plan.name: execute
plan.rationale: Task strategy with modification tools for chaining operations. Multiple cycles support verification and error handling

plan.name: investigate-analyze-synthesize-fs
plan.rationale: We must first gather file information using tools (investigate), then reason about structure and patterns (analyze), and finally present a coherent report (synthesize). Thread accumulation preserves findings across steps; only the final synthesized report should be returned.
